title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

The first point is earned for a derivative in the form of the product rule, namely a ′  ( x )=p ( x )⋅h ( x )+q ( x )⋅  h ′  ( x ), MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaceWGHbGbauaacaaMi8+aae WaaeaacaWG4baacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaeyypa0JaamiCaiaayIW7daqa daqaaiaadIhaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacqGHflY1caWGObGaaGjcVpaabm aabaGaamiEaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaiabgUcaRiaadghacaaMi8+aaeWa aeaacaWG4baacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaeyyXICTaaGjcVlqadIgagaqbai aayIW7daqadaqaaiaadIhaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacaGGSaaaaa@5527@ where p ( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGWbGaaGjcVpaabmaaba GaamiEaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaaaa@3840@ and q ( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGXbGaaGjcVpaabmaaba GaamiEaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaaaa@3841@ are both polynomials.

Simplification is not required to earn the third point. Function values must be substituted into the expression.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

The first point is earned for showing lim x→2 x 2 −4 1− ( f ( x ) ) 3 =4. The second point is earned for calculating f ( 2 )=0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGMbGaaGjcVpaabmaaba GaaGOmaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaiabg2da9iaaicdaaaa@39B4@ in the context of setting the denominator 1− ( f ( x ) ) 3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaIXaGaeyOeI0YaaeWaae aacaWGMbGaaGjcVpaabmaabaGaamiEaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaaGaayjk aiaawMcaamaaCaaaleqabaGaaG4maaaaaaa@3C51@ equal to 0. MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaIWaGaaiOlaaaa@349F@

The third point is earned for evidence of applying L’Hospital’s Rule, which includes a new limit of a quotient where differentiation was attempted in both the numerator and denominator. Note that incorrect notation such as lim x→2 x 2 −4 1− ( f ( x ) ) 3 = 0 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWfqaqaaiGacYgacaGGPb GaaiyBaaWcbaGaamiEaiabgkziUkaaikdaaeqaaOWaaSaaaeaacaWG 4bWaaWbaaSqabeaacaaIYaaaaOGaeyOeI0IaaGinaaqaaiaaigdacq GHsisldaqadaqaaiaadAgacaaMi8+aaeWaaeaacaWG4baacaGLOaGa ayzkaaaacaGLOaGaayzkaaWaaWbaaSqabeaacaaIZaaaaaaakiabg2 da9maalaaabaGaaGimaaqaaiaaicdaaaaaaa@4949@ makes a response not eligible to earn the third point.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.
